website_summaries.verdict: Warm and weatherproof, these fun gloves will give you a colorful pick-me-up during the dark winter months.
pros: Grippy, touchscreen-compatible palm and excellent insulation with fixed fleece lining
Warm and weatherproof with an ergonomic, pre-curved fit
Sizes XS to XL with choice of color and pattern
cons: Not warm enough for winter sports

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but definitely big so I would size down. I ordered a medium will be trying a small. It is lined in the inside with fleece but feels a little thin in comparison to other ski gloves I've tried on. The tag on the glove describes it as "rides best in colder conditions" as opposed to: warmer conditions and ice cold conditions. The touchscreen control works with all the fingers but the fingers are kind of fat so it makes it a little difficult to type. EDIT: after 2 hours of boarding and much falling, my gloves were completely soaked on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: aaaa

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice glove but it is not made for ice cold ...
customer_reviews.text: I have what I consider normal sized hands for a 5'5" female and I ordered a medium. They were definitely too big. They probably would have been ok to layer another pair of gloves on them but I was really hoping for a pair that did the job in just one glove. It is a very nice glove but it is not made for ice cold weather, which is what I bought them for. I ended up returning them to keep looking for the right pair.
customer_reviews.author: D.G.

customer_reviews.title: Burton Women's Gloves
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of burton gloves. I bought these to replace a pair I have owned for several years. These have exceeded my expectations. I love that you can use your cell phone while wearing these gloves and not have to deal with the hassle of removing to pick up a phone call or send a text. The inside is nicely lined and keep my hands very warm on the slopes.

product_meta.title: Burton Women's Profile Glove
product_meta.description: Here at Burton we believe gloves and mittens should have equal rights, and are very much against glove profiling. But when a glove has a bomber-tough DRYRIDE two-layer fabric, midweight Thermacore insulation, and a quick-drying and toasty fleece lining…well, you have no choice but to call a warm, weatherproof glove warm and weatherproof. It's nothing personal, but that's just what the women's Burton Profile Glove is: warm, weatherproof, and highly versatile. Screen Grab sweetens the deal, offering easy surfing on any touchscreen device.
feature_bullets: Screen Grab Toughgrip palm for total touchscreen control
Thermacore insulation provides added warmth; Fixed fleece lining is lightweight and warm
